summary: Utility module that centralises dateâ€‘time handling for the modelling framework. It provides functions to validate years, compose and parse time strings, convert between native Python, NumPy, pandas and cftime datetime objects, compute timestep durations, and generate start/end timestamps for forcing datasets.
business_intent: Ensure consistent and reliable temporal data processing across the modelling workflow, facilitating correct alignment of input forcing data and model time steps.
